text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 9 damage to all enemy minions.

flavor: Cleanup on grave plot 4.
name: Cremate
text: Discover a minion with a Dark Gift. It costs (2) less.

flavor: Her frostburn is worse than her frostbite.
name: Frostburn Matriarch
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with a Dark Gift, summon two 4/4 Dragons with Taunt.

flavor: It's the emblem of fire season.
name: Sigil of Cinder
text:
[x]At the start of your next
turn, deal $6 damage
randomly split among
all enemies.

flavor: Like fire, felfire, this fire in my skin.
name: Felfire Blaze
text:
[x]After you cast a Fel spell,
destroy this and deal 2
damage to all enemies.

flavor:
"Did you bring water?"
"I THOUGHT YOU WERE BRINGING THE WATER!"
name: Overheat
text: Give your minions +1/+1. Discard a random Nature spell to give them +1/+1 more.

flavor: The spirits burned at Teldrassil shall not be forgotten. They live on within a new world tree, the Crown of Harmony.
name: Amirdrassil
text: [x]Summon a 1-Cost minion. Gain 1 Armor. Draw 1 card. Refresh 1 Mana |4(Crystal, Crystals). (Improves each use!)

flavor:
Charma, charma, charma, charma, charma chameleon
You combust and glow, you combust and glow...
name: Charred Chameleon
text: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, give a friendly minion +1/+2 and Rush.

flavor: And I fired! And I missed. And I fired again! And I missed again. This went on for several hours.
name: Bursting Shot
text:
Deal $2 damage to
three random enemies.

flavor: It's like the old saying goes: where there's smoke, there's often fire... and where there's fire, there's often more fire.
name: Scorching Winds
text: Deal $3 damage. Discard a random Fire spell to deal $3 more.

flavor: To be clear, the grove is not SUPPOSED to be smoldering.
name: Smoldering Grove
text: Draw {0} card. (Upgrades each turn, but discards after {1}!)1Draw {0} cards. (Discards this turn!)

flavor: Poor Inferno Herald, why so blue?
name: Inferno Herald
text:
[x]After you cast a Fire spell,
get a random Elemental and
reduce its Cost by (3).

flavor: You'll get it when you're smolder.
name: Smoldering Strength
text: Give a friendly minion +{0}/+{0}. (Upgrades each turn, but discards after {1}!)1Give a friendly minion +{0}/+{0}. (Discards this turn!)

flavor: We all know what happens when you fly too close to the sun. But THIS is what happens when you fly straight into it.
name: Smoldering Ascent
text: Deal ${0} damage to all enemy minions. (Upgrades each turn, but discards after {1}!)1Deal ${0} damage to all enemy minions. (Discards this turn!)

flavor: UM ACTUALLY THAT’S A WANING CRESCENT
name: Light of the New Moon
text: [x]Give a minion +3/+3. (Cast 3 spells to return this to your hand when played.)

flavor: You'd be making that face too if you just got played for the sixteenth time.
name: Everburning Phoenix
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn. Deathrattle: At end of turn, get another Phoenix.

flavor: Wow, this blew up.
name: Smoke Bomb
text: Discover a Combo, Battlecry, or Stealth minion with a Dark Gift.

flavor: She loves me... she loves me not...
name: Petal Picker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Imbued your Hero Power twice, draw 2 cards.

flavor: Where did I put de metals? It cindersword.
name: Cindersword
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with a Dark Gift, gain +3 Attack.

flavor: The Firelord has been banned from chat for flaming.
name: Flames of the Firelord
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a random
enemy minion. If you're
holding a card that costs
(8) or more, deal $8 instead.

flavor: The purple means it's stealthy. It's stealthy fire.
name: Shadowflame Stalker
text: Battlecry: Discover a Demon with a Dark Gift. Get a copy of it.

flavor: I LOVE YOU NOT!
name: Emberscarred Whelp
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a 5-Cost card. Gain 1 Mana Crystal next turn only.

flavor: "I keep it right here. Inside my hooves."
name: Keeper of Flame
text: [x]Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3. They are destroyed in 3 turns.

flavor: "Get a load of this guy."
name: Living Flame
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Fire spell.

flavor: One Fire and Shadow swirl, please!
name: Shadowflame Suffusion
text: [x]Deal $2 damage. Discover a Warrior minion with a Dark Gift.

flavor: What's the difference between a pyromancer and a flamemancer? One knows their Greek roots, the other BURNS THEM DOWN!
name: Zaqali Flamemancer
text: Battlecry: If every card in your hand is of a different Cost, reduce their Costs by (2).

flavor: You never would've guessed it, but Ancients love doing the Hot Embers Challenge.
name: Searing Reflection
text: Draw a minion. Summon an 8/8 copy of it with Divine Shield.

flavor: Unholy, so hot right now.
name: Volcoross
text: [x]Rush, Taunt Battlecry: Choose to spend 10, 20, or 30 Corpses to gain that many stats.

flavor: Fel from grace about 10,000 years ago.
name: Scorchreaver
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Fel spell. Reduce the Cost of Fel spells in your hand by (1).

flavor: Don't say T.R.E.A.T. or he'll drool lava everywhere.
name: Magma Hound
text: [x]Rush. After this attacks a minion and survives, deal this minion's Attack damage split among all enemies.

flavor: From the ashes, a new card is drawn.
name: Conflagrate
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Its owner draws a card.

flavor: Under Fyrakk's assault, even those with the purest devotion to nature shall burn.
name: Emberroot Destroyer
text:
[x]Whenever your hero takes
damage on your turn,
deal 3 damage to a random
enemy minion.

flavor: If you thought evil turtles that live in lava are cool, this one's also a DRAGON!
name: Dragon Turtle
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with a Dark Gift, give your hero +3 Attack this turn and 6 Armor.

flavor: He'll have you burning red.
name: Tindral Sageswift
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If it's your opponent's turn, deal 4 damage instead.

flavor: Originally devoted to snuffing out the Titans' influence, Shadowflame has twisted Fyrakk's mind into an abyss of malice. His Dreamrender now only hungers for a world of embers.
name: Fyrakk the Blazing
text: [x]Immune to Fire spells. Battlecry: Cast 15 Mana worth of Fire spells at random enemies.

flavor: Dogs are a dragon's best friend.
name: Tending Dragonkin
text: Battlecry: Copy the lowest Cost Beast in your hand.

flavor: Why don't you make like a burning world tree and ashleave???
name: Ashleaf Pixie
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain Divine Shield and Lifesteal.
